tit.e: setsugo (a name including a chinese character, 雪)
tit.cmt: カッコ内を修正しました。

sen.j: 雪号（せつごう）とは能楽シテ方観世流において、隠居後に名のる「雪」字を用いた雅号のこと。
sen.e: Setsugo is a pseudonym after retirement, using a chinese character, '雪', in shite-kata (main roles) of Kanze school of Nohgaku.
Setsugo is a pseudonym after the retirement, using a Chinese character, '雪,' in shite-kata (main roles) of Kanze school of Noh.
sen.cmt: the を挿入しました。chinese→Chinese,Nohgaku→Noh と修正しました。カンマの位置を修正しました。
sen.e: Setsugo is a pseudonym after the retirement, using a Chinese character, '雪,' in shite-kata (main roles) of Kanze school of Noh.

sen.j: 主として宗家および分家にしかゆるされず、弟子家の場合には特に流儀に功績のある者もしくは名手の誉れ高い者にかぎられる。
sen.e: Only the head and the branch families are allowed to use the name, and in case of disciples using the name, it was limited to someone who has a successful career in style or is an honored master.
Only the head and the branch families are allowed to use the name, and in case of disciples using the name, it is limited to someone who has a successful career in style or is an honored master.
Only the head and the branch families are allowed to use the name, and in case of disciples using the name, it is limited to someone who has a successful career in style or is an honored master.
